definition.content:
## Overview

This integration publishes traffic replay results from [Speedscale](https://docs.speedscale.com/reference/integrations/datadog/) into Datadog. This lets you combine your observability data from Datadog with the results of a particular Speedscale replay to investigate the root cause of poor performance.

![logo](https://speedscale.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Landscape-1.svg)
